subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets often point to a lack of energy or mental lapses on defense for the inconsistency that has led to a 7-10 record. But they do not give reasons for those flaws.
snippet: The Nets often point to a lack of energy or mental lapses on defense for the inconsistency that has led to a 7-10 record. But they do not give reasons for those flaws.
